alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:28AM EDT until July 29 at 5:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Eastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Western Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 530 AM EDT. * At 428 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Harbor to near Tiffin, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lorain, Elyria, Sandusky, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Port Clinton, Amherst, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Wellington, New London, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Castalia, Oberlin and South Amherst. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Erie; Huron; Lorain; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca
